{{Infobox Berry |name = #30 Nomel |image = [[File:Nomel.png]] |caption = This Berry is quite sour overall, with the sourness especially concentrated at the pointed end. |growtime = 4h 12m 0s |harvest = 29 berries |replant = 10% |points = 850 |flavor =
*10 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *20 sour }} '''Nomel''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Pinap]]. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 20 mins 40 secs || 1 hour 26 mins 40 secs || 2 hours 55 mins || 4 hours 12 mins - 8 hours 24 mins |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:NomelTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:NomelTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:NomelTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 4 hours 12 mins -
8 hours 24 mins || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 2 hours 48 mins -
5 hours 36 mins || 34 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 1 hour 52 mins -
3 hours 44 mins || 23 mulch |} == Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Nomel berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Pinap.png|30px]] [[Pinap]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Pinap.png|30px]] [[Pinap]] |- style="height: 50px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || || || || |- style="height: 50px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || || || || |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Pinap.png|30px]] [[Pinap]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Pinap.png|30px]] [[Pinap]] |} {{Berries}}
